languages.text: "Флот Осознание благодарит мирян за сознательность в служении делу всепостижения. Пометка о даровании привилегированного статуса обслуживания будет занесена в ваше досье".

"The Cognisance Fleet values the laity's diligence in furthering the goal of total knowledge acquisition. Privileged service status is hereby granted. A note to this effect will be added to your file."
languages.original_text: "Флот Осознание благодарит мирян за сознательность в служении делу всепостижения. Пометка о даровании привилегированного статуса обслуживания будет занесена в ваше досье".

traits.locale_text: "The Cognisance Fleet values the laity's diligence in furthering the goal of total knowledge acquisition. Privileged service status is hereby granted. A note to this effect will be added to your file."

"The Cognisance Fleet values the laity's diligence in furthering the goal of total knowledge acquisition. Privileged service status is hereby granted. A note to this effect will be added to your file."

languages.text: 「コグニサンス艦隊は総合的な知識の習得という目標を推進するために、信徒の勤勉さを重んじます。サービス付与に関する特権地位をここに付与します。その旨を記したメモが貴殿のファイルに追加されます」
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet values the laity's diligence in furthering the goal of total knowledge acquisition. Privileged service status is hereby granted. A note to this effect will be added to your file."

traits.locale_text: 「コグニサンス艦隊は総合的な知識の習得という目標を推進するために、信徒の勤勉さを重んじます。サービス付与に関する特権地位をここに付与します。その旨を記したメモが貴殿のファイルに追加されます」

languages.text: “真理开拓者舰队重视该教外人士在实现全面知识获取目标方面的努力，特此授予其特权服务地位。效果说明将被添加到您的文件中。”
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet values the laity's diligence in furthering the goal of total knowledge acquisition. Privileged service status is hereby granted. A note to this effect will be added to your file."

traits.locale_text: “真理开拓者舰队重视该教外人士在实现全面知识获取目标方面的努力，特此授予其特权服务地位。效果说明将被添加到您的文件中。”

languages.text: «La Flota Conciencia valora la diligencia de los laicos en la promoción del objetivo de la adquisición total del conocimiento. Por la presente se le concede el estatus de servicio con privilegios. Se añadirá una observación al respecto en su expediente».
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet values the laity's diligence in furthering the goal of total knowledge acquisition. Privileged service status is hereby granted. A note to this effect will be added to your file."

traits.locale_text: «La Flota Conciencia valora la diligencia de los laicos en la promoción del objetivo de la adquisición total del conocimiento. Por la presente se le concede el estatus de servicio con privilegios. Se añadirá una observación al respecto en su expediente».

languages.text: « La Flotte de la Connaissance salue les efforts des profanes dans la poursuite de l'objectif d'un savoir total. Vous profiterez désormais d'un statut privilégié. Une annotation reflétant ce changement sera ajoutée à votre dossier. »
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet values the laity's diligence in furthering the goal of total knowledge acquisition. Privileged service status is hereby granted. A note to this effect will be added to your file."

traits.locale_text: « La Flotte de la Connaissance salue les efforts des profanes dans la poursuite de l'objectif d'un savoir total. Vous profiterez désormais d'un statut privilégié. Une annotation reflétant ce changement sera ajoutée à votre dossier. »

languages.text: "Die Erkenntnisflotte weiß den Eifer {mf|des Laien|der Laiin} bei der Beschaffung von Wissen zu schätzen. Hiermit wird privilegierter Dienstleistungsstatus gewährt. Eine entsprechende Notiz wird Eurer Akte hinzugefügt."
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet values the laity's diligence in furthering the goal of total knowledge acquisition. Privileged service status is hereby granted. A note to this effect will be added to your file."

traits.locale_text: "Die Erkenntnisflotte weiß den Eifer {mf|des Laien|der Laiin} bei der Beschaffung von Wissen zu schätzen. Hiermit wird privilegierter Dienstleistungsstatus gewährt. Eine entsprechende Notiz wird Eurer Akte hinzugefügt."

languages.text: "Malumat Filosu, eksiksiz irfan edinimi hedefine ulaşılması hususunda ruhban dışı sınıfın gayretine değer vermektedir. İşbu nedenle ayrıcalıklı hizmet statüsü onaylanmıştır. Bu yönde bir not, dosyanıza eklenecektir."
languages.original_text: "The Cognisance Fleet values the laity's diligence in furthering the goal of total knowledge acquisition. Privileged service status is hereby granted. A note to this effect will be added to your file."

traits.locale_text: "Malumat Filosu, eksiksiz bilgi edinimi hedefini sürdürme konusunda kâfirlerin gerekli özeni göstermesine değer veriyor. Bu nedenle ayrıcalıklı hizmet statüsü onaylandı. Dosyanıza bunu açıklayan bir not eklenecek."
